Reviews.Title: Droid Tablet 8.2"
Reviews.Author: William Bruce Hickman
Reviews.Content: So far, My wife loves the Tablet, The only thing I have to complain about is that it does not come with a SIMS Card, you have to get that through your carrier apparently, and nowhere in the description of the product does it mention that! My suggestion is to put that piece of information where it can be seen easily!!!  She had to wait over a week before she could use her droid, because they had to send her one. This is like buying a brand new car and not being able to drive it!

Reviews.Title: Fantastic Tablet with ICS on it
Reviews.Author: Alan Tegel
Reviews.Content: I have the XYboard 10.2, and it was shaky when Honeycomb was out; however, once ICS came out the device really works well.  I use this device as a replacement for my ereader (albeit eInk is way better outside), and it is the right form factor for doing late night reading or watching a movie.  The funny part is that the spec's on this device nearly match the current Kindle Fire HD form factor, and yet this device has been out for one year+ ....  Also, the 4G rocks ...
